Combinatorics_KG.description: This KG encapsulates fundamental combinatorial principles, including factorials, permutations, combinations, stars and bars, and inclusion-exclusion.

agents.name: FactorialAgent
agents.description: Computes the factorial of a number.
agents.groovyScript: class FactorialAgent { def generateCandidate(n) { if(n <= 1)return 1; return n * generateCandidate(n-1); } }
